name: ROPIVACAINE HYDROCHLORIDE
indications: ropivacaine hydrochloride injection indicated production local regional anesthesia surgery acute pain management . surgical anesthesia : epidural block surgery including cesarean section ; major nerve block ; local infiltration . acute pain management : epidural continuous infusion intermittent bolus , e.g . , postoperative labor ; local infiltration
warningsAndPrecautions: ropivacaine hydrochloride injection , usp clear colorless , preservative-free solution , available single-dose containers 2 mg/ml ( 0.2 % ) , 5 mg/ml ( 0.5 % ) , 10 mg/ml ( 1 % ) concentrations . storage solutions stored 20ºc 25°c ( 68 ºf 77 °f ) ; excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . ropivacaine hydrochloride injection , usp single dose vials product code unit sale strength 033 ndc 83854-013-25 unit 25 0.2 % 40 mg per 20 ml ( 2 mg per ml ) ndc 83854-013-01 20 ml single dose vial 035 ndc 83854-014-05 unit 5 0.5 % 150 mg per 30 ml ( 5 mg per ml ) ndc 83854-014-01 30 ml single dose vial 036 ndc 83854-015-25 unit 25 1 % 200 mg per 20 ml ( 10 mg per ml ) ndc 83854-015-01 20 ml single dose vial ropivacaine hydrochloride injection container closure made natural rubber latex . single dose - discard unused portion .
adverseReactions: ropivacaine hydrochloride contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ropivacaine local anesthetic agent amide type .
indications_original:
Ropivacaine Hydrochloride Injection is indicated for the production of local or regional anesthesia for surgery and for acute pain management.
                  
                     Surgical Anesthesia: epidural block for surgery including cesarean section; major nerve block; local infiltration.

 
                  
                     Acute Pain Management: epidural continuous infusion or intermittent bolus, e.g., postoperative or labor; local infiltration
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ropivacaine Hydrochloride Injection, USP is a clear colorless, and preservative-free solution, available in single-dose containers in 2 mg/mL (0.2%), 5 mg/mL (0.5%), and 10 mg/mL (1%) concentrations.
                  Storage
                  Solutions should be stored at 20ºC to 25°C (68 ºF to 77 °F); excursions permitted to 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Ropivacaine Hydrochloride Injection, USP Single Dose Vials

adverseReactions_original: Ropivacaine Hydrochloride is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to ropivacaine or to any local anesthetic agent of the amide type.
